comments:
Description:
No invalid binding in crosstab will lead the exception occurs when preview the attached report[1102]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070606-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, Open the attached report design
2, Check the binding of the crosstab
3, Preview

Expected result:
Preview successfully

Actual result:
Exception occurs

Error log:
data.olap.invalidBindingReferToInexitDim ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: The binding "Customer::COUNTRY" refers to invalid levels. at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.util.OlapQueryUtil.validateBinding(OlapQueryUtil.java:67) at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.impl.query.CubeCursorImpl.<init>(CubeCursorImpl.java:62) at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.impl.query.CubeQueryResults.getCubeCursor(CubeQueryResults.java:75) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.CubeResultSet.<init>(CubeResultSet.java:78)

Created an attachment (id=70267)
attached design file
This is an invalid bug. The level customer::STATE has never be declared in xtab.Only when it is declared in xtab the binding expression can reference to it.

traces.message: The binding "Customer::COUNTRY" refers to invalid levels.
